text: On 8 December 2021, an Indian Air Force Mi-17 helicopter crashed in Coonoor, Tamil Nadu, at 1220 hours IST. The Chief of Defence Staff General Bipin Rawat and 13 others, including his wife and other family members were onboard the helicopter. As of 1630 hours IST, 11 bodies were recovered from the crash site. ==References== Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in Asia Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2021 Category:December 2021 events Category:History of Tamil Nadu Category:2021 disasters in India
title: 2021 Indian Air Force Mil Mi-17 crash
